1370: Uergina moved to Helle voet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Folpertus at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Wouter in 1371 at age 19.
1372: Gave birth to Rembrecht in 1372 at age 20.
1374: Gave birth to Myrthel in 1374 at age 22.
1377: Gave birth to Godeweris in 1377 at age 25.
Lost son Rembrecht when Rembrecht was 6 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Woubbrecht in 1378 at age 26.
1381: Gave birth to Marisseis in 1381 at age 29.
1384: Gave birth to Ermerut in 1384 at age 32.
1386: Lost daughter Godeweris when Godeweris was 10 years old.
1388: Gave birth to Nimme in 1388 at age 36.
